alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Inland Worcester; Maryland Beaches; Somerset; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 01 at 3:28PM EDT until April 02 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts of 40 to 45 mph, becoming northwest this evening. Winds may briefly gust to as high as 50 mph this evening. * WHERE...In Maryland, Dorchester, Wicomico, Somerset, Inland Worcester and Maryland Beaches Counties. In Virginia, Accomack and Northampton Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight EDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Dorchester; Inland Worcester; Maryland Beaches; Somerset; Wicomico
